data.actual_result: Discord shows a local normal playing status for Fortnite, but no playing status to other users
data.expected_result: When you refresh, Discord should show your status to everyone else
data.short_description: Refreshing Discord while having Fortnite open removes playing status until you interact with the game
data.steps_to_repro: - Run Fortnite, and go into the Battle Royale mode - Verify that you have a Rich Presence playing status for Fortnitr - Resfresh Discord using Ctrl + R - Observe your playing status when Discord reloads - Verify with other users to see if you have a playing status - Interact with the game in any way (Change game mode, join a party) and observe your playing status again
